articles.title: Derek Chauvin to be sentenced for murder of George Floyd - live updates - Telegraph.co.uk
articles.description: Derek Chauvin faces up to 30 years in prison when he is sentenced on Friday for the killing of George Floyd, the African American man whose death sparked a global protest movement.
articles.content:
But Professor Richard Frase, from the University of Minnesota's Law School, told The Telegraph he would be very surprised if Chauvin declined to address the judge.

articles.author: Amy Forliti And Steve Karnowski
articles.title: Judge rejects Chauvin's request for new trial in Floyd death - CP24 Toronto's Breaking News
articles.description: Former Minneapolis police Officer Derek Chauvin awaited sentencing Friday for the murder of George Floyd, whose death under Chauvin's knee set off a fierce and sometimes violent reckoning over racial injustice in America.
articles.content: MINNEAPOLIS (AP) - Former Minneapolis police Officer Derek Chauvin awaited sentencing Friday for the murder of George Floyd, whose slow death under Chauvin's knee set off a fierce and sometimes viole… [+6107 chars]
